column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The mischievous Miqo'te looks at you expectantly.
Search for the Carbuncle doll.
Speak with the mischievous Miqo'te.
...If I ask you for help, you'll help me, won't you?
You will!? Good, because I'm having a problem with a runaway doll.
What will you say?
A doll...?
It...ran away?
That's right. All I did was lend him a little aether, and he hopped up and dashed off down the street. Mama and Papa bought him for me as a special gift─now I've gone and lost him!
They'll be furious with me for losing the toy I kept asking for, so please...you have to help me find him!
Okay! I'll hurry home to see if he went there...

And you can search...um...the rest of the city! Oh, he's a yellow Carbuncle doll, by the way, and I <Emphasis>think</Emphasis> he was headed north... Anyway, meet me back here when you have him, or, you know, you just give up.
You find a yellow Carbuncle doll. Lifelike expressions aside, it appears to be otherwise motionless... Return to Journey's End, and deliver him to the mischievous Miqo'te.
<sigh> He wasn't there. I don't think I'll ever see him again...
<squeal> You found him! Just like Big Moony would have!
Oh, that's what I call the neighbor who used to play with me. She was so tall and smart, and always so nice!
She'd tell me stories about her friend─a powerful wizard─who could summon his very own Carbuncle companion. That's why I wanted one for myself!
I have to learn how to move him around better, though, so that when Moony comes back she can see how hard I've been practicing my magicks!
This is for you. Papa says that when someone helps you, you have to “show your gratitude.” So...thanks for finding my Carbuncle. Bye!
